messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Book
messages.msgSnippet: I LOVE his books!  They are such a good read for younger kids to listen to.  I have not read a story by him that I was not touched by one way or another.  And
messages.messageBody:
I LOVE his books! They are such a good read for younger kids to listen to. I have not read a story by him that I was not touched by one way or another. And every time a helicopter flies over, the kids look for pigs. Nothing wrong with kids who have no idea pigs can't fly!

Esther
----- Original Message -----
From: A
To: Unschooling
Sent: Sunday, August 26, 2001 6:23 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Book


I don't know how many of you have read Dick King-Smith, but we love him
here. We read Babe, and loved it much more than the movie (which was
too sad and scary for my kids).
We just finished reading "Sophie's Snail", and really loved it. Sophie
is wonderful. If you love nature and exploring the garden, and kids and
their honest way of being, you will love Sophie.
Just wanted to share.....
We also love Mr. Ape. This was wonderful.
Ann

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Book
messages.msgSnippet: Ah yes, thanks for that info.... THis is a wonderful book, though I don t have to use any of it...  I m even more relaxed than relaxed I guess.  Ha, ha. Ann
messages.messageBody:
Ah yes, thanks for that info....
THis is a wonderful book, though I don't have to use any of it... I'm even
more relaxed than relaxed I guess. Ha, ha.
Ann

messages.subject: Book
messages.msgSnippet: Can anyone tell me the author of the book I think is called The Relaxed Homeschooler, and Relaxed Record Keeping.  Is it Mary Hood?  I have a friend in SC I
messages.messageBody:
Can anyone tell me the author of the book I think is called The Relaxed
Homeschooler, and Relaxed Record Keeping. Is it Mary Hood? I have a
friend in SC I want to pass this info to, and of course I can't find it
now. Ha, ha.
Thanks,
Ann

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Book
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, Mary Hood, who lives in Georgia, wrote The Relaxed Homeschooler  ;) ... From: A  To: Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Yes, Mary Hood, who lives in Georgia, wrote The Relaxed Homeschooler ;)
